parameters.name: MaintainEndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of the maintenance window. The time is in the *HH:mm*Z format. The time is displayed in UTC. For example, if you want the maintenance to end at 2:00 (UTC+8), set this parameter to `18:00Z`.

> The end time must be one hour later than the start time. For example, if the value of the MaintainStartTime parameter is `17:00Z`, the value of the MaintainEndTime parameter must be `18:00Z`.

parameters.name: MaintainStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the maintenance window. The time is in the *HH:mm*Z format. The time is displayed in UTC. For example, if you want the maintenance to start at 1:00 (UTC+8), set this parameter to `17:00Z`. After you call the API operation, you can view the actual time in the ApsaraDB for Redis console. For more information, see [Set a maintenance window](~~55252~~).
